deity_markdown: [Aminara](/Deities.aspx?ID=664), [Bokrug](/Deities.aspx?ID=568), [Embaral](/Deities.aspx?ID=340), [Gozreh](/Deities.aspx?ID=284), [Hanspur](/Deities.aspx?ID=347), [Hataam](/Deities.aspx?ID=596), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=517), [Lady Nanbyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=311), [Lysianassa](/Deities.aspx?ID=692), [Neith](/Deities.aspx?ID=636), [Oaur-Ooung](/Deities.aspx?ID=585), [Orgesh](/Deities.aspx?ID=576), [Seafarer's Hope](/Deities.aspx?ID=255), [Srikalis, Sritaming, and Sribaril](/Deities.aspx?ID=302), [Waves Of The Boundless Sea](/Deities.aspx?ID=375), [Zogmugot](/Deities.aspx?ID=508)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Control Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=1473)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 321 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Aminara](/Deities.aspx?ID=664), [Bokrug](/Deities.aspx?ID=568), [Embaral](/Deities.aspx?ID=340), [Gozreh](/Deities.aspx?ID=284), [Hanspur](/Deities.aspx?ID=347), [Hataam](/Deities.aspx?ID=596), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=517), [Lady Nanbyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=311), [Lysianassa](/Deities.aspx?ID=692), [Neith](/Deities.aspx?ID=636), [Oaur-Ooung](/Deities.aspx?ID=585), [Orgesh](/Deities.aspx?ID=576), [Seafarer's Hope](/Deities.aspx?ID=255), [Srikalis, Sritaming, and Sribaril](/Deities.aspx?ID=302), [Waves Of The Boundless Sea](/Deities.aspx?ID=375), [Zogmugot](/Deities.aspx?ID=508)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 50 feet long by 50 feet wide

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Fortitude (see text)

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

By imposing your will upon the water, you can raise or lower the level of water in the chosen area by 10 feet. Creatures that have the water trait and that are in the area when you Cast the Spell must attempt a Fortitude save, with the effects of the [_slow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) spell.
name: Control Water

**Traditions**

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">

---

<summary>
Raise or lower water in a large area.
</summary>
summary: Raise or lower water in a large area.
summary_markdown: Raise or lower water in a large area.
text: Control Water Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 321 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Aminara, Bokrug, Embaral, Gozreh, Hanspur, Hataam, Isis, Lady Nanbyo, Lysianassa, Neith, Oaur-Ooung, Orgesh, Seafarer's Hope, Srikalis, Sritaming, and Sribaril, Waves Of The Boundless Sea, Zogmugot Range 500 feet Area 50 feet long by 50 feet wide Defense Fortitude (see text) Duration 1 hour --- By imposing your will upon the water, you can raise or lower the level of water in the chosen area by 10 feet. Creatures that have the water trait and that are in the area when you Cast the Spell must attempt a Fortitude save, with the effects of the slow spell.
